Talk_0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>This <clr:0000>strange stone statue<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:0:0> It must be
the construct that grants us the<clr:0000> power<clr:ffff>
we're after, but...
Hmmm... How do we get it?
Talk_0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal_00>If the <clr:0000>text <clr:ffff>is correct, then this construct
should hold the<clr:0000> power<clr:ffff> we seek...
Talk_0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Ease_00>Indeed. <sp:5:0:0>Apparently, it allows you to
<clr:0000>instantly build something<clr:ffff>, as long as it's
something that you've built before.
That <clr:0000>strange stone statue<clr:ffff> is a "<clr:0000>construct<clr:ffff>"
that can supposedly grant us that power.

But we don't know how to wake it up.<sp:5:0:0>
Hmm...<sp:5:0:0> There has to be some way to get
it to respond, right?
Talk_0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Notice_00>Huh?<sp:5:0:0> What's with the outfit?<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000>Or...<sp:5:0:0> No. I should act surprised that someone
showed up...<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Get it together, me...<sp:5:0:0>
Talk_0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Oh? <sp:5:0:0>Did you pass the interview too?


<sp:0:2:2:5000>He obviously did. Why else would he come strolling
into a place like this? Ugh, why'd I even bring it up?<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Er...<sp:5:0:0>just forget it. It's not important.


What is important is this text we're
investigating. It's fascinating.

It claims that this stone statue should be
able to grant us an "<clr:0000>ancient power<clr:ffff>."
Talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Ease_00>That's right. This <clr:0000>peculiar stone statue<clr:ffff>
is nothing less than one of the fabled
<clr:0000>constructs<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>In fact, I have some writing here that
explains this so-called "<clr:0000>ancient power<clr:ffff>"
in detail.
It reads, <sp:5:0:0>"This ability will allow you
to commit <clr:0000>any structure you create<clr:ffff>
to memory.
"Any object committed to memory
can be <clr:0000>instantly reproduced<clr:ffff>."

<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Painful_01>Just think of it! If we could instantly
re-create anything we'd ever made...

the Yiâ€”<sp:5:1:0> Er, I mean, the survey team's,
uh...investigation of this land would be
swift and unstoppable!
The text further claims that this construct
should be able to grant us that power.
Oh, we just have to wake it up!
